alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 14 at 3:27PM CST until December 15 at 3:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM CST FRIDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...St. John The Baptist and St. Charles Parishes. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Advisory, from 3 AM to 3 PM CST Friday. For the second Coastal Flood Advisory, from 2 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
